mn115:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn115:2.1: “Yani kanici, bhikkhave, bhayani uppajjanti sabbani tani balato uppajjanti, no panditato;
mn115:2.2: ye keci upaddava uppajjanti sabbe te balato uppajjanti, no panditato;
mn115:2.3: ye keci upasagga uppajjanti sabbe te balato uppajjanti, no panditato.
mn115:2.4: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, nalagara va tinagara va aggi mutto kutagaranipi dahati ullittavalittani nivatani phusitaggalani pihitavatapanani;
mn115:2.5: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yani kanici bhayani uppajjanti sabbani tani balato uppajjanti, no panditato;
mn115:2.6: ye keci upaddava uppajjanti sabbe te balato uppajjanti, no panditato;
mn115:2.7: ye keci upasagga uppajjanti sabbe te balato uppajjanti, no panditato.
mn115:2.8: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sappatibhayo balo, appatibhayo pandito;
mn115:2.11: Natthi, bhikkhave, panditato bhayam, natthi panditato upaddavo, natthi panditato upasaggo.
mn115:3.1: Evam vutte, ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn115:3.2: “kittavata nu kho, bhante, pandito bhikkhu ‘vimamsako’ti alamvacanaya”ti?
mn115:3.3: “Yato kho, ananda, bhikkhu dhatukusalo ca hoti, ayatanakusalo ca hoti, paticcasamuppadakusalo ca hoti, thanathanakusalo ca hoti—
mn115:3.4: ettavata kho, ananda, pandito bhikkhu ‘vimamsako’ti alamvacanaya”ti.
mn115:4.9: Ima kho, ananda, attharasa dhatuyo yato janati passati—
mn115:5.1: “Siya pana, bhante, annopi pariyayo, yatha ‘dhatukusalo bhikkhu’ti alamvacanaya”ti?
mn115:5.4: pathavidhatu, apodhatu, tejodhatu, vayodhatu, akasadhatu, vinnanadhatu.
mn115:5.5: Ima kho, ananda, cha dhatuyo yato janati passati—
mn115:6.1: “Siya pana, bhante, annopi pariyayo, yatha ‘dhatukusalo bhikkhu’ti alamvacanaya”ti?
mn115:6.4: sukhadhatu, dukkhadhatu, somanassadhatu, domanassadhatu, upekkhadhatu, avijjadhatu.
mn115:6.5: Ima kho, ananda, cha dhatuyo yato janati passati—
mn115:7.1: “Siya pana, bhante, annopi pariyayo, yatha ‘dhatukusalo bhikkhu’ti alamvacanaya”ti?
mn115:7.4: kamadhatu, nekkhammadhatu, byapadadhatu, abyapadadhatu, vihimsadhatu, avihimsadhatu.
mn115:7.5: Ima kho, ananda, cha dhatuyo yato janati passati—
mn115:8.1: “Siya pana, bhante, annopi pariyayo, yatha ‘dhatukusalo bhikkhu’ti alamvacanaya”ti?
mn115:8.5: Ima kho, ananda, tisso dhatuyo yato janati passati—
mn115:9.1: “Siya pana, bhante, annopi pariyayo, yatha ‘dhatukusalo bhikkhu’ti alamvacanaya”ti?
mn115:9.5: Ima kho, ananda, dve dhatuyo yato janati passati—
mn115:10.3: cakkhu ceva rupa ca sotanca sadda ca ghananca gandha ca jivha ca rasa ca kayo ca photthabba ca mano ca dhamma ca.
mn115:10.4: Imani kho, ananda, cha ajjhattikabahirani ayatanani yato janati passati—
mn115:11.3: ‘imasmim sati idam hoti, imassuppada idam uppajjati,
mn115:11.4: imasmim asati idam na hoti, imassa nirodha idam nirujjhati, yadidam—
mn115:12.2: “Idhananda, bhikkhu ‘atthanametam anavakaso yam ditthisampanno puggalo kanci sankharam niccato upagaccheyya, netam thanam vijjati’ti pajanati;
mn115:12.3: ‘thananca kho etam vijjati yam puthujjano kanci sankharam niccato upagaccheyya, thanametam vijjati’ti pajanati;
mn115:12.4: ‘atthanametam anavakaso yam ditthisampanno puggalo kanci sankharam sukhato upagaccheyya, netam thanam vijjati’ti pajanati;
mn115:12.5: ‘thananca kho etam vijjati yam puthujjano kanci sankharam sukhato upagaccheyya, thanametam vijjati’ti pajanati.
mn115:12.6: ‘Atthanametam anavakaso yam ditthisampanno puggalo kanci dhammam attato upagaccheyya, netam thanam vijjati’ti pajanati,
mn115:12.7: ‘thananca kho etam vijjati yam puthujjano kanci dhammam attato upagaccheyya, thanametam vijjati’ti pajanati.
mn115:13.1: ‘Atthanametam anavakaso yam ditthisampanno puggalo mataram jivita voropeyya, netam thanam vijjati’ti pajanati;
mn115:13.2: ‘thananca kho etam vijjati yam puthujjano mataram jivita voropeyya, thanametam vijjati’ti pajanati.
mn115:13.3: ‘Atthanametam anavakaso yam ditthisampanno puggalo pitaram jivita voropeyya …pe…
mn115:13.4: arahantam jivita voropeyya, thanametam vijjati’ti pajanati;
mn115:13.5: ‘atthanametam anavakaso yam ditthisampanno puggalo dutthacitto tathagatassa lohitam uppadeyya, netam thanam vijjati’ti pajanati;
mn115:13.6: ‘thananca kho etam vijjati yam puthujjano dutthacitto tathagatassa lohitam uppadeyya, thanametam vijjati’ti pajanati.
mn115:13.7: ‘Atthanametam anavakaso yam ditthisampanno puggalo sangham bhindeyya, netam thanam vijjati’ti pajanati;
mn115:13.8: ‘thananca kho etam vijjati yam puthujjano sangham bhindeyya, thanametam vijjati’ti pajanati.
mn115:13.9: ‘Atthanametam anavakaso yam ditthisampanno puggalo annam sattharam uddiseyya, netam thanam vijjati’ti pajanati;
mn115:13.10: ‘thananca kho etam vijjati yam puthujjano annam sattharam uddiseyya, thanametam vijjati’ti pajanati.
mn115:14.1: ‘Atthanametam anavakaso yam ekissa lokadhatuya dve arahanto sammasambuddha apubbam acarimam uppajjeyyum, netam thanam vijjati’ti pajanati;
mn115:14.2: ‘thananca kho etam vijjati yam ekissa lokadhatuya eko araham sammasambuddho uppajjeyya, thanametam vijjati’ti pajanati.
mn115:14.3: ‘Atthanametam anavakaso yam ekissa lokadhatuya dve rajano cakkavattino apubbam acarimam uppajjeyyum, netam thanam vijjati’ti pajanati;
mn115:14.4: ‘thananca kho etam vijjati yam ekissa lokadhatuya eko raja cakkavatti uppajjeyya, thanametam vijjati’ti pajanati.
mn115:15.1: ‘Atthanametam anavakaso yam itthi araham assa sammasambuddho, netam thanam vijjati’ti pajanati;
mn115:15.2: ‘thananca kho etam vijjati yam puriso araham assa sammasambuddho, thanametam vijjati’ti pajanati.
mn115:15.3: ‘Atthanametam anavakaso yam itthi raja assa cakkavatti, netam thanam vijjati’ti pajanati;
mn115:15.4: ‘thananca kho etam vijjati yam puriso raja assa cakkavatti, thanametam vijjati’ti pajanati.
mn115:15.5: ‘Atthanametam anavakaso yam itthi sakkattam kareyya … marattam kareyya … brahmattam kareyya, netam thanam vijjati’ti pajanati;
mn115:15.6: ‘thananca kho etam vijjati yam puriso sakkattam kareyya … marattam kareyya … brahmattam kareyya, thanametam vijjati’ti pajanati.
mn115:16.1: ‘Atthanametam anavakaso yam kayaduccaritassa ittho kanto manapo vipako nibbatteyya, netam thanam vijjati’ti pajanati;
mn115:16.2: ‘thananca kho etam vijjati yam kayaduccaritassa anittho akanto amanapo vipako nibbatteyya, thanametam vijjati’ti pajanati.
mn115:16.4: yam manoduccaritassa ittho kanto manapo vipako nibbatteyya, netam thanam vijjati’ti pajanati;
mn115:16.5: thananca kho etam vijjati yam vaciduccaritassa …pe…
mn115:16.6: yam manoduccaritassa anittho akanto amanapo vipako nibbatteyya, thanametam vijjatiti pajanati.
mn115:17.1: ‘Atthanametam anavakaso yam kayasucaritassa anittho akanto amanapo vipako nibbatteyya, netam thanam vijjati’ti pajanati;
mn115:17.2: ‘thananca kho etam vijjati yam kayasucaritassa ittho kanto manapo vipako nibbatteyya, thanametam vijjati’ti pajanati.
mn115:17.4: yam manosucaritassa anittho akanto amanapo vipako nibbatteyya, netam thanam vijjati’ti pajanati;
mn115:17.6: yam manosucaritassa ittho kanto manapo vipako nibbatteyya, thanametam vijjati’ti pajanati.
mn115:18.1: ‘Atthanametam anavakaso yam kayaduccaritasamangi tamnidana tappaccaya kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjeyya, netam thanam vijjati’ti pajanati;
mn115:18.2: ‘thananca kho etam vijjati yam kayaduccaritasamangi tamnidana tappaccaya kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjeyya, thanametam vijjati’ti pajanati.
mn115:19.2: yam manoduccaritasamangi tamnidana tappaccaya kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjeyya, netam thanam vijjati’ti pajanati;
mn115:19.4: yam manoduccaritasamangi tamnidana tappaccaya kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjeyya, thanametam vijjati’ti pajanati.
mn115:19.5: ‘Atthanametam anavakaso yam kayasucaritasamangi tamnidana tappaccaya kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjeyya, netam thanam vijjati’ti pajanati;
mn115:19.6: ‘thananca kho etam vijjati yam kayasucaritasamangi tamnidana tappaccaya kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjeyya, thanametam vijjati’ti pajanati.
mn115:19.8: yam manosucaritasamangi tamnidana tappaccaya kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjeyya, netam thanam vijjati’ti pajanati;
mn115:19.10: yam manosucaritasamangi tamnidana tappaccaya kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjeyya, thanametam vijjati’ti pajanati.
mn115:20.1: Evam vutte, ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn115:20.4: “Tasmatiha tvam, ananda, imam dhammapariyayam ‘bahudhatuko’tipi nam dharehi, ‘catuparivatto’tipi nam dharehi, ‘dhammadaso’tipi nam dharehi, ‘amatadundubhi’tipi nam dharehi, ‘anuttaro sangamavijayo’tipi nam dharehi”ti.
mn115:20.6: Attamano ayasma anando bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
